title: Understanding Pie Charts
text: A pie chart is a circular statistical graphic, which is divided into slices to illustrate numerical proportions. Each slice represents a category's contribution to the total.

title: Steps to Create a Pie Chart
text: To create a pie chart, you need to select the data you want to represent. This data is usually in a table format with categories and their corresponding values.

title: Selecting the Data
text: First, highlight the data you want to include in the pie chart. This includes both the categories and their values.

title: Inserting the Pie Chart
text: After selecting the data, navigate to the 'Insert' tab in your spreadsheet software and choose 'Pie or Doughnut Chart'.

title: Finalizing the Pie Chart
text: Once the pie chart is inserted, you can customize it by adding labels, changing colors, and adjusting the layout to better represent your data.
